select SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, TB.* FROM ( SELECT
a.DETAIL_SEQ, a.DISPLAY_SEQ, a.REPORT_SEQ, a.DETAIL_SORT, a.DETAIL_TIME, b.REPORT_TITLE, b.REPORT_GUBUN, case b.REPORT_GUBUN when 'reportGubun_3' then CONCAT(replace(b.REPORT_URL, #{replacePath}, '') , b.REPORT_DC) when 'reportGubun_4' then CONCAT(replace(b.REPORT_URL, #{replacePath}, '') , b.REPORT_PREVIEW) else b.REPORT_URL end REPORT_URL, case b.REPORT_GUBUN WHEN 'reportGubun_3' then (SELECT CONCAT(ATCH_FILE_ID, ',',ifnull(FILE_WIDTH, ''), ',', ifnull(FILE_HEIGHT, ''), ',', ifnull(PLAY_TIME, '')) FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL c WHERE c.STRE_FILE_NM = b.REPORT_DC) when 'reportGubun_4' then (SELECT CONCAT(ATCH_FILE_ID, ',',ifnull(FILE_WIDTH, ''), ',', ifnull(FILE_HEIGHT, ''), ',', ifnull(PLAY_TIME, '')) FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL c WHERE c.STRE_FILE_NM = b.REPORT_DC) ELSE REPORT_PREVIEW end REPORT_PREVIEW FROM TB_DISPLAYDETAIL a, TB_REPORTINFO b WHERE DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq} AND a.REPORT_SEQ = b.REPORT_SEQ ORDER BY a.DETAIL_SORT DESC ) TB ORDER BY TB.DETAIL_SORT DESC

SELECT X.*, c.FILE_WIDTH , c.FILE_HEIGHT, CASE WHEN c.FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp4', 'avi', 'mpeg') THEN 'MEDIA' WHEN c.FILE_EXTSN IN ('jpg', 'jpeg', 'gif', 'png', 'bmp') THEN 'IMAGE' WHEN c.FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp3', 'wav', 'mid') THEN 'MUSIC' else 'URL' END AS mediaType FROM (SELECT a.DETAIL_SEQ, a.DISPLAY_SEQ, a.REPORT_SEQ, a.DETAIL_SORT, a.DETAIL_TIME, b.REPORT_TITLE, b.REPORT_GUBUN, b.REPORT_DC ,replace(b.REPORT_URL, #{replacePath}, '') as REPORT_URL FROM TB_DISPLAYDETAIL a, TB_REPORTINFO b WHERE DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq} and a.REPORT_SEQ = b.REPORT_SEQ ORDER BY a.DETAIL_SORT DESC) X left join lettnfiledetail c on X.REPORT_DC = c.STRE_FILE_NM ORDER BY X.DETAIL_SORT DESC

and REPORT_SEQ IN
#{item}
GROUP BY DISPLAY_SEQ order by DISPLAY_SEQ ASC

SELECT c.DETAIL_SEQ, d.REPORT_TITLE, c.DETAIL_SORT, c.DETAIL_TIME , b.DISPALY_PAGECNT , d.REPORT_GUBUN, case d.REPORT_GUBUN when 'reportGubun_3' then CONCAT(replace(d.REPORT_URL, #{replacePath}, '') , d.REPORT_DC) when 'reportGubun_4' then CONCAT(replace(d.REPORT_URL, #{replacePath}, '') , d.REPORT_DC) else d.REPORT_URL end REPORT_URL FROM TB_AGENTINFO a, TB_DISPLAYPAGEINFO b, TB_DISPLAYDETAIL c, TB_REPORTINFO d WHERE a.DISPLAY_SEQ = b.DISPLAY_SEQ AND b.DISPLAY_SEQ = c.DISPLAY_SEQ AND c.REPORT_SEQ = d.REPORT_SEQ AND a.AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode} ORDER BY c.DETAIL_SORT ASC

SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.DETAIL_SEQ, a.DISPLAY_SEQ, b.REPORT_TITLE, a.DETAIL_SORT, a.DETAIL_TIME, b.REPORT_GUBUN, case b.REPORT_GUBUN WHEN 'reportGubun_3' then CONCAT(REPLACE(b.REPORT_URL, #{replacePath}, '') , b.REPORT_DC) when 'reportGubun_4' then CONCAT(REPLACE(b.REPORT_URL, #{replacePath}, '') , b.REPORT_DC) else b.REPORT_URL end REPORT_URL, c.DISPALY_PAGECNT FROM TB_DISPLAYDETAIL a, TB_REPORTINFO b, TB_DISPLAYPAGEINFO c WHERE a.DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq} and a.REPORT_SEQ = b.REPORT_SEQ and a.DISPLAY_SEQ = c.DISPLAY_SEQ ORDER BY a.DETAIL_SORT DESC ) TB ORDER BY TB.DETAIL_SORT DESC

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(DETAIL_TIME),0) FROM TB_DISPLAYDETAIL a WHERE DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq}

INSERT INTO TB_DISPLAYDETAIL( DISPLAY_SEQ, REPORT_SEQ, DETAIL_SORT, DETAIL_TIME, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES ( #{displaySeq}, #{reportSeq}, (SELECT ifnull((max(DETAIL_SORT ) +1),1) FROM tb_displaydetail a WHERE DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq} ) , (SELECT case a.REPORT_GUBUN when 'reportGubun_4' then (SELECT ifnull(PLAY_TIME, 1) FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE b.REPORT_SEQ = a.REPORT_SEQ) else '1' end as PLAY_TIME FROM TB_REPORTINFO a WHERE a.REPORT_SEQ = #{reportSeq}), now(), #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now() , #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR});
UPDATE TB_DISPLAYPAGEINFO SET DISPALY_PAGECNT = (SELECT ifnull(COUNT(*),0) FROM tb_displaydetail WHERE DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq}) , DISPALY_TOTALTIME = ( select ifnull(sum( X.displayTime),0) from ( select ifnull(DETAIL_TIME,0) as displayTime from tb_displaydetail WHERE DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq}) X ) WHERE DISPLAY_SEQ = #{displaySeq} ;
